title: Short-Intensive Science Learning Design Course Based on Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories, research methodologies, and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing and operating science education programs for the general public, requiring flexible learning designs that accommodate mobile environments and BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) conditions

learning_goals: Learners can independently plan distance education learning designs based on the OULDI methodology.
Learners can develop science education content suitable for mobile microlearning environments.
Learners can measure educational effectiveness through formative assessment-centered learning activity design.

resources: Mobile Learning Management System (LMS) Access Permissions

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
